page.title: 18HOME LIFE 2
page.content: After that we do some knitting because we are making blankets to go to Africa. At l2.00 it is lunch-time and I have a school lunch in the canteen. After playtime we come in and finish off our work or listen to a story read by our teacher. At the end of the day we are told what we need to bring to school the next day, and then we go home. When I get home I play with my sister for a while and then have tea. If it is a Wednesday I go to the Red Cross to learn about First Aid. We learn to put on bandages or have a test. After that we have a drink or snack at the bar. When I get home I might do some colouring and have something to eat. Then I watch television and play with my sister. I then read for a while and go to bed between 9.00 and 10.00 p.m.
